post:
Hello,

We have prepared a special package to celebrate Christmas & New Year holidays - KVM SSD Special. It has the same specs as the original KVM SSD, however the price is only $6.99/quarter! It will be available until January 2nd or until the stock lasts, whatever comes first!

**KVM SSD Special**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon E3-1245v2
Unlimited CPU core 3.6GHz Turbo
2GB RAM
60GB SSD
Linux/Windows OS
Unmetered 250Mbit bandwidth
1 IPv4 address
Control Panel - OpenNebula
Location - France (OVH)
Price - $6.99/quarter
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=37
</pre>

The package is limited to 1 per customer.

The payment gateway is Bitpay (Bitcoin) or 2Checkout (PayPal), it is also possible to pay via Skrill manually, just open a ticket.

https://www.wishosting.com
